list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the SI base unit of length (equivalent to approximately 39.37 inches), first introduced as a unit of length in the metric system.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: sit two meters away from the TV screen
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ngồi cách màn hình TV hai mét

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a device that measures and records the quantity, degree, or rate of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they read the meters once a month
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ đọc mét mỗi tháng một lần

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the rhythm of a piece of poetry, determined by the number and length of feet in a line.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the Horatian ode has an intricate governing meter
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: The Horatian Ode có một đồng hồ quản lý phức tạp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: measure or regulate by means of a meter.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the huge capital outlay required to meter every household is not available
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các khoản chi vốn khổng lồ cần thiết để mét mọi hộ gia đình không có sẵn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: in nouns denoting lines of poetry with a specified number of feet or measures.
